Package farm

Class ItemFactory

java.lang.Object
farm.ItemFactory
public abstract class ItemFactory
extends java.lang.Object
Abstract Java Class responsible for generating game objects for various uses, e.g. supplying the store with duplicate items for the players inventory Follows a standard Factory design pattern
Author:
Alex Burling(arb142)

    ItemFactory()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static java.util.Dictionary<FarmItem.FarmItems,​Animal> GetAllAnimals()
    Supplies a Dictionary of all available Animal objects within the game, keyed with a String that is the Animal's "name"
    static java.util.Dictionary<FarmItem.FarmItems,​Crop> GetAllCrops()
    Supplies a Dictionary of all available Crop objects within the game, keyed with a String that is the Crops's "name"
    static java.util.Dictionary<FarmItem.FarmItems,​Item> GetAllItems()
    Supplies a Dictionary of all available Item objects within the game, keyed with a String that is the Items's "name"
    static FarmItem GetNew​(FarmItem item)
    Given an item as an object, return a new instance of the item Overloaded function signature, call as GetNew(String name) to get item from a String
    static FarmItem GetNew​(FarmItem.FarmItems name)
    Given the name of an item as a string, return a new instance of the item Overloaded function signature, call as GetNew(FarmItem item) to get item from an object TODO change implementation to use instanceof to support naming animal i.e.

      public static java.util.Dictionary<FarmItem.FarmItems,​Animal> GetAllAnimals()

    • GetNew

      public static FarmItem GetNew​(FarmItem item)
      Given an item as an object, return a new instance of the item Overloaded function signature, call as GetNew(String name) to get item from a String
      Parameters:
      item - FarmItem Object to create (eg. "Wheat")
      Returns:
      FarmItem the corresponding requested FarmItem

    • GetNew

      public static FarmItem GetNew​(FarmItem.FarmItems name)
      Given the name of an item as a string, return a new instance of the item Overloaded function signature, call as GetNew(FarmItem item) to get item from an object TODO change implementation to use instanceof to support naming animal i.e. cow.name = 'Bessie'?
      Parameters:
      name - name of item to create (eg. "Wheat")
      Returns:
      FarmItem the corresponding requested FarmItem
